snippet: The fiery blast also destroyed a satellite that Facebook had planned to use to expand internet services in Africa....
abstract: SpaceX rocket explodes on its launch platform at Cape Canaveral, Fla, destroying $200 million communications satellite meant to extend Facebook's reach across African continent; blast is setback for company and underscores dangers of NASA's increasing reliance on private space travel companies, as it will also delay cargo deliveries to International Space Station.

byline.original: By KENNETH CHANG, MIKE ISAAC and MATT RICHTEL

lead_paragraph: The fiery blast also destroyed a satellite that Facebook had planned to use to expand internet services in Africa.

headline.main: SpaceX Rocket Explodes at Launchpad in Cape Canaveral
headline.print_headline: SpaceX Blast Puts Big Goals Into Question
